meanings.definition: To remove from a selection or list.
meanings.sent1: She was deselecting the items she no longer needed from her shopping list.
meanings.sent2: I am deselecting some songs from my playlist to make it shorter.
meanings.sent3: The computer kept deselecting the wrong files, making it a frustrating task.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a busy street, constantly deselecting thoughts to focus on one.
meanings.sent5: The magician's wand seemed to have the power of deselecting objects from thin air.

meanings.definition: The action of choosing not to select something.
meanings.sent1: Her deselecting of the dessert option surprised everyone at the table.
meanings.sent2: The deselecting of candidates for the job position took longer than expected.
meanings.sent3: His deselecting of the most popular movie made his friends laugh.
meanings.sent4: The deselecting of the red carpet event left many disappointed fans.
meanings.sent5: The art of deselecting the perfect gift requires careful thought and consideration.
